attributes.text:
The form object is responsible for managing form items. For that, it takes advantage of two existing qooxdoo classes. The {@link qx.ui.form.Resetter} is used for resetting and the {@link qx.ui.form.validation.Manager} is used for all validation purposes.

The view code can be found in the used renderer ({@link qx.ui.form.renderer}).
Returns whether something has already been added.
true, if nothing has been added jet.
A supported form item.
The string, which should be used as label.
The validator which is used by the validation {@link qx.ui.form.validation.Manager}.
The name which is used by the data binding controller {@link qx.data.controller.Form}.

Adds a form item to the form including its internal {@link qx.ui.form.validation.Manager} and {@link qx.ui.form.Resetter}.

Hint: The order of all add calls represent the order in the layout.
The button to add.

Adds a button to the form.

Hint: The order of all add calls represent the order in the layout.
The title of the group header.

Adds a group header to the form.

Hint: The order of all add calls represent the order in the layout.
The class of the renderer which should be used. If no rendere is given, the default renderer ({@link qx.ui.form.renderer.Single}) will be used.
Create the renderer and add the form as constructor parameter instead.
Takes all the added form items, group headers and buttons and gives them to the renderer. The renderer is responsible for all the UI related tasks.
Instance of the renderer.
Accessor mehtod for the renderer which returns all added buttons in an array.
An array containing all added buttons.
Accessor mehtod for the renderer which returns all added items in a array containing a map of all items: {title: title, items: [], labels: [], names: []}
An array contining all necessary data for the renderer.
Returns all added items as a map.
A map containing for every item a entry with its name.
Returns the internally used validation manager. If you want to do some enhanced validation tasks, you need to use the validation manager.
The used manager.
Redefines the values used for resetting. It calls {@link qx.ui.form.Resetter#redefine} to get that.
Resets the form. This means reseting all form items and the validation.
Validates the form using the {@link qx.ui.form.validation.Manager#validate} method.
The validation result.
